title: US pressure campaign on Venezuela driven by oil not drugs, claims Colombian president

content:

title: Is the US invading Venezuela? Or trying to make a deal?
description: CARACAS, Venezuela — On the face of it, the United States appears closer than ever to mounting a military campaign to remove President Nicolás Maduro from power in Venezuela. President Donald Trump says he has authorized the CIA to conduct covert operations inside the Caribbean nation, and has massed troops, fighter jets and warships just off its coastline. title: El dictador Nicolás Maduro arengó a los venezolanos desde un cuartel militar: “La patria tendrá nuestra vida, si es necesario”
description: En el Fuerte Tiuna, uno de los principales complejos castrenses del país, se mostró rodeado de sus más altos funcionarios y buscó comprometer a todos ante las tensiones con EEUU: “No hay excusas para nadie, civil, político, militar o policía”
